resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103027</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103027</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206526</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Narrative Cartoons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erzählende Karikaturen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dessins animés Narratifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartoons Narrativos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fumetti Narrativi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφηγηματικά κινούμενα σχέδια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historietas Narrativas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is based on essays and photos provided by Peace Corps Volunteers. It asks students to create narrative cartoons that illustrate the lives of a young people in an African country.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">basiert auf Versuchen und die Fotos, die vom 
Friedenskorpse zur Verfügung gestellt werden, erbietet sich 
freiwillig. Es bittet Kursteilnehmer, erzählende Karikaturen zu
erstellen, die die Leben junger Leute in einem afrikanischen Land 
veranschaulichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est basé sur des essais et les photos fournies 
par des corps de paix offre. Elle demande à des étudiants de 
créer les dessins animés narratifs qui illustrent les vies des 
jeunes dans un pays africain.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é baseado em essays e as fotos fornecidas pelo 
corpo de paz oferecem-se. Pede que os estudantes críem os 
cartoons narrativos que ilustram as vidas de um pessoa novo em um 
país africano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è basato sui saggi e le foto fornite da Peace 
corpo si offre volontariamente. Chiede agli allievi di 
creare i fumetti narrativi che illustrano le vite dei giovani in un 
paese africano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι βασισμένος στα δοκίμια και τις φωτογραφίες που 
παρέχονται από τους εθελοντές ειρήνης Σώμα. Ζητά 
από τους σπουδαστές για να δημιουργήσει τα αφηγηματικά κινούμενα 
σχέδια που επεξηγούν τις ζωές νέοι σε μια της Αφρικής χώρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">se basa en ensayos y las fotos proporcionadas por 
el cuerpo de paz se ofrecen voluntariamente. Pide que los 
estudiantes creen las historietas narrativas que ilustran las vidas de
una gente joven en un país africano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206526</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103027</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/narrative-cartoons</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
